description: High-quality solutions for easy and safe solar panel installation: frames for solar panels, fixings and accessories
keywords: frames for solar panels, brackets for solar panels, co-planar framework, fixings for solar panels
title: Installation systems for SOLAR PANELS: frames, fixings and accessories | INDEX

main-section.title: Installation systems for SOLAR PANELS: frames, fixings and accessories
main-section.image-alt: Technician walking between a solar installation on a roof
main-section.p: Solar installations need to be fully resistant to outdoor elements. That is why INDEX<sup>Â®</sup> offers high-quality products for steel and aluminium solar panel structures, as well as all-in-one installation solutions to simplify component handling and assembly at the installation site.

features-section.title: A reliable system that is easy to assemble and maintain

list.title: Looking to the future
list.text: The development of this new solution has been a challenging research and innovation project that led to the incorporation of cutting-edge technologies in materials/coatings and the need to design new profiles and assembly systems to deliver innovations to today's market.

list.title: Technical support
list.text: The company provides comprehensive advice regarding the different systems, their suitability for the installation location, custom calculations and component breakdowns.

list.title: Certified and environmentally friendly production in Spain
list.text: A large proportion of the products included in the new range is produced in Spain, which is necessary to guarantee the high levels of quality and innovation required.

list.title: Products adapted to small users
list.text: We like to get to know the needs of all our customers to offer the best service.

list.title: Training
list.text: We provide tailored training to show how to correctly use all the options and functions of our products.

list.title: Index Academy
list.text: Aprende a instalar placas solares usando nuestros sistemas con videotutoriales claros y sencillos.

structures-section.title: Structures for solar panels
structures-section.subtitle: We offer various solutions for both co-planar and triangular structures to cater for the most common installations on the market.

types.title: CO-PLANAR STRUCTURES FOR SOLAR PANELS
types.description: Frames for solar panels designed for sloping roofs. Enable panels to be easily and securely installed on a range of surfaces, whether vertically or horizontally.

systems.title: SC-PSA
systems.description: Coplanar system with winged aluminium profile (PSA-A). Direct fixing

qualities-list: System for sloping roofs with assembly parallel to the roof surface.
Installation on metal roofs in a raised position to accommodate ribs.
Portrait panel orientation (vertical).
Highly effective, rapid installation directly onto the roof.
Profile available in uncut format to simplify installation planning.
Joint between profiles using an inner profile and self-drilling screws, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

qualities-list: System for sloping roofs with assembly parallel to the roof surface.
Installation on all roof types, assembled on adjustable fixing accessories.
Portrait (vertical) and landscape (horizontal) panel orientation.
Fixing of pre-assembled system on adjustable fixing accessories, anchored to the roof or substructure, with a wide range of adjustable fixing accessories available.
Profile available in uncut format to simplify installation planning.
Joint between profiles using an inner profile and self-drilling screws, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems

qualities-list: System for sloping roofs with assembly parallel to the roof surface.
Installation on all roof types, assembled on adjustable fixing accessories and directly on sheet metal.
Portrait (vertical) and landscape (horizontal) panel orientation.
Fixing of pre-assembled system on adjustable fixing accessories, anchored to the roof or substructure, with a wide range of adjustable fixing accessories available.
Profile available in uncut format to simplify installation planning.
Profile installed in pre-cut sections to reduce the number of metres of profile used.
Joint between profiles using an inner profile and self-drilling screws, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

qualities-list: System for flat and low-gradient roofs, mounted at an angle with respect to the roof.
Installation on all roof types, on pre-assembled triangles with an angle adjustable to 25Â°, 30Â° or 35Â°.
Portrait panel orientation (vertical).
Option of fixing the system directly to the substructure by anchoring the feet of the triangle supports.
Option of mounting the assembled system on an auxiliary profile frame anchored to the substructure, using fast-fixing nuts to the feet of the triangle supports.
Profile available in uncut format to simplify installation planning.
Lengthways joint between profiles using an inner profile and self-drilling screws, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
Installation of profiles and triangles using pre-assembled fast-fixing solutions.
Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

qualities-list: System for flat and low-gradient roofs, mounted at an angle with respect to the roof.
Installation on all roof types, on pre-assembled triangles with an angle adjustable to 25Â° or 35Â°.
Portrait (vertical) and landscape (horizontal) panel orientation.
Option of fixing the system directly to the substructure by anchoring the feet of the triangle supports.
Option of mounting the assembled system on an auxiliary perforated guide frame anchored to the substructure, using fast-fixing nuts to the feet of the triangle supports.
Guide available in uncut format to simplify installation planning.
Lengthways joint between guides using an inner coupling and fast-fixing DIN603 bolts, without obstructing the fixing of the panels.
Installation of profiles and triangles using fast-fixing bolts.
Panel fixing with highly reliable and easy-to-install innovative solutions that are interchangeable between all assembly systems.

app-section.title: INDEX Solar Fixing: The APP to simplify and optimise your solar panel installation projects
app-section.parragraph: Discover the INDEX Solar Fixing APP, an innovative application designed to simplify and optimise your projects for the installation of SOLAR PANELS. With just a few simple inputs, our application will quickly and accurately provide you with the fixings and installation systems required to carry out your project.

range-section.title: Range of products for solar installations
range-section.subtitle: Here explain that the products can be acquired separately or together when you acquire a system or a kit. Here are the ranges.

range-cards.title: CONNECTORS AND ACCESSORIES
range-cards.description: For installation of solar panel structures

range-cards.title: ADJUSTABLE ACCESSORIES
range-cards.description: For the installation of solar panels

range-cards.title: DIRECT FIXING ACCESSORIES
range-cards.description: For the installation of solar panels

calculator-section.title: Solar Panel Kits. More cost-effective, less waste
calculator-section.subtitle: These kits are suitable for co-planar or triangular installations and contain all the necessary components for the complete installation
calculator-section.image-alt: Solar panel kit box in front of a solar panel installation
calculator-section.p-1: We have kits for 2 or 3 panels (starter kits) for various types of solar panel supports (co-planar and triangular). kits para 2 or 3 panels (starter kits), that allow the installation of additional panels without incurring unnecessary costs.
calculator-section.p-2: These kits contain everything you need to expand your installation but allow you to remove unnecessary products (duplicate clamp assemblies), therefore saving on costs and avoiding waste.
calculator-section.question-number-solar-panels: How many solar panels do you want to add? Select the number of panels
calculator-section.fix-a-solar-panel: To install {num} solar panel, you need
calculator-section.fix-multiple-solar-panels: To install {num} solar panels, you need

others-section.title: Other anchor fittings for solar panel installations
others-section.subtitle: At INDEX, we offer our customers a wide range of anchor fittings to ensure that your solar panels are installed securely.

materials-cards.title: Metal fixings
materials-cards.description: Metal expansion fixings or wedged fixings in carbon steel and stainless steel, approved for the installation of elements in cracked concrete, non-cracked concrete, seismic loads and R30-R120 fire resistance in concrete.

materials-cards.title: Plastic fixings
materials-cards.description: Made from high-quality NylonÂ®, plastic fixings are the perfect, cost-effective solution for fixing light and medium weight loads.

materials-cards.title: Chemical anchors
materials-cards.description: Chemical injection fixings are the optimal solution for fixing heavy loads on concrete and masonry or where an approved product is required.

materials-cards.title: Bolts and screws
materials-cards.description: A wide variety of self-tapping screws and self-threading screws are available, as well as different types of heads, diameters and lengths.

materials-cards.title: Plastic clamps
materials-cards.description: NylonÂ® cable ties and their plastic clamps are some of the most highly demanded products in the world of professional installations.

contact-section.title: Request more information
contact-section.name: Name
contact-section.personal-data: I authorise the use of my personal data by the technical staff of TÃ©cnicas Expansivas SL (Tax ID [CIF] B-26220491) to contact me exclusively for the purpose of training me and providing me with technical advice regarding their products.
contact-section.legal-data: I have read and accept the Legal Notice and Privacy Policy.
contact-section.description-1: TÃCNICAS EXPANSIVAS S.L. informs you that the personal data provided voluntarily on this website, the purpose, intended transfers and other circumstances of which are communicated when the personal data is collected, may, depending on the specific case, have any of the following purposes: responding to your request, complaint or question, maintaining the established relationship, the comprehensive and commercial management of customers, accounting and invoicing or sending of communications of news and activities related with TÃCNICAS EXPANSIVAS S.L., including by electronic means.
contact-section.description-2: The data included in our files is absolutely confidential and will be processed with the utmost confidentiality and in compliance with all the requirements set out in the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the 27<sup>th</sup> of April 2016. The data is registered in our files for the time necessary for the purpose for which it was collected. The period during which the personal data will be kept will be that established by current legislation and always during the period of the provision of the service for which it was provided.
contact-section.description-3: We do not recommend sending personal data that is classified as highly confidential by data protection legislation, such as that related to health, as it is not sent coded or encrypted. Therefore, if you send this type of data, it will be at your own risk.
contact-section.description-4: The user may at any time exercise their rights of access, rectification, opposition, erasure, restricted processing or requesting of its portability in accordance with the content of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) of the 27<sup>th</sup> of April 2016 by sending a letter to the data controller: ValentÃ­n GÃ³mez, Manager, along with a photocopy of their National Identity Document (DNI), to TÃCNICAS EXPANSIVAS SL | P.I. La Portalada II | C/ Segador 13, 26006 | LogroÃ±o (La Rioja) or by email to info@indexfix.com
